name: rust
notes:
## Notes on Rust

* GUI standard or best practice [seems fragmented](https://raphlinus.github.io/ui/druid/2019/11/22/reactive-ui.html)
  * [moxie](https://blog.anp.lol/rust/moxie-intro/)
  * [druid](https://github.com/xi-editor/druid)

* Would be preferred over flutter, in terms of accessibility and portability, if the developer experience was more straight forward
* It's already hard to sell dart/flutter as inclusive and friendly to web devs
